headline: A Decade of Turbulence, Family Love and Basketball
abstract: When Charon Francis-Hartley split with her partner, financial insecurity ensued. Between the difficulties, she and her children found an escape on the court.
lead_paragraph: Some mornings, when Charon Francis-Hartley hears a knock at her door, she thinks, “This is the day.” This is the day someone is bringing an eviction notice.
keywords: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
